1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Relmap operators for clock type.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Cox.Type.Clock
6  ( ropsTypeClock,
7    -- * add-clock
8    consAddClock, relmapAddClock, relkitAddClock,
9    -- * of-clock
10    consOfClock, relmapOfClock, relkitOfClock,
11    -- * alt-clock
12    consAltClock, relmapAltClock, relkitAltClock,
13  ) where
14
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture     as O
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base         as B
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax       as S
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data         as D
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core         as C
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base     as Rop
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Cox.Get  as Rop
22
23-- | Implementation of relational operators.
24ropsTypeClock :: (D.CContent c) => [C.Rop c]
25ropsTypeClock = Rop.rops "type"
26    [ consAddClock
27      O.& [ "add-clock /N [-day E] [-hour E] [-min E] [-sec E]"
28            O.& "-clock . -times? -day? -hour? -min? -sec?" ]
29    , consOfClock
30      O.& [ "of-clock E [-sign /N] [-day /N] [-hour /N] [-min /N] [-sec /N]"
31            O.& "-content . -sign? -day? -hour? -min? -sec?" ]
32    , consAltClock
33      O.&  [ "alt-clock /P [-sign E] [-day E] [-hour E] [-min E] [-sec E]"
34             O.& "-clock . -sign? -day? -hour? -min? -sec?" ]
35    ]
36
37
38-- ----------------------  clock
39
40-- | [add-clock \/c -day /D/]   Add term \/c as a clock of /D/ days, i.e., @|D'|@.
41--   [add-clock \/c -hour /H/]  Add term \/c as a clock of /H/ hours, i.e., @|H|@.
42--   [add-clock \/c -min /M/]   Add term \/c as a clock of /M/ minutes, i.e., @|00:M|@.
43--   [add-clock \/c -sec /S/]   Add term \/c as a clock of /S/ seconds, i.e., @|00:00:S|@.
44--
45consAddClock :: (D.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
46consAddClock med =
47    do cops     <- Rop.getWhere    med "-where"
48       clock    <- Rop.getTerm     med "-clock"
49       times    <- Rop.getOptionCox (D.pInt 1) med "-times"
50       day      <- Rop.getOptionCox (D.pInt 0) med "-day"
51       hour     <- Rop.getMaybeCox med "-hour"
52       minute   <- Rop.getMaybeCox med "-min"
53       sec      <- Rop.getMaybeCox med "-sec"
54       let hms   = fill (hour, minute, sec)
55       Right $ relmapAddClock med (cops, clock, (times, day, hms))
56    where
57      zero = D.coxLit $ D.pInt 0
58      fill (h, Nothing, Just s) = fill (h, Just zero, Just s)
59      fill (Nothing, Just m, s) = fill (Just zero, Just m, s)
60      fill hms = hms
61
62-- | Create @clock@ relmap.
63relmapAddClock :: (D.CContent c) =>
64  C.Intmed c -> (D.CopSet c, S.TermName, (D.Cox c, D.Cox c, (D.MaybeCox c, D.MaybeCox c, D.MaybeCox c))) -> C.Relmap c
65relmapAddClock med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitAddClock
66
67-- | Create @clock@ relkit.
68relkitAddClock :: (D.CContent c)
69  => (D.CopSet c, S.TermName, (D.Cox c, D.Cox c, (D.MaybeCox c, D.MaybeCox c, D.MaybeCox c)))
70  -> C.RelkitFlow c
71relkitAddClock _ Nothing = Right C.relkitNothing
72relkitAddClock (cops, n, (times, day, (hour, minute, sec))) (Just he1) = Right kit2 where
73      he2       = n `D.headCons` he1
74      kit2      = C.relkitJust he2 $ C.RelkitAbLinear False f2 []
75      f2 _ cs1  = do let run = D.coxRunCox cops he1 cs1
76                     t <- getInt     $ run times
77                     d <- getInteger $ run day
78                     h <- getMaybe (getInt . run) hour
79                     m <- getMaybe (getInt . run) minute
80                     s <- getMaybe (getInt . run) sec
81                     let clock = D.clockTimes t $ clockFrom d h m s
82                     Right $ D.pClock clock : cs1
83
84clockFrom :: Integer -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Int -> D.Clock
85clockFrom d (Just h)  (Just m)  (Just s)   = D.clockFromDhms d h m s
86clockFrom d (Just h)  (Just m)  (Nothing)  = D.clockFromDhm  d h m
87clockFrom d (Just h)  (Nothing) (Nothing)  = D.clockFromDh   d h
88clockFrom d (Nothing) (Nothing) (Nothing)  = D.clockFromD    d
89clockFrom _ _ _ _ = B.bug "clockFrom"
90
91getMaybe :: (c -> B.Ab a) -> Maybe c -> B.Ab (Maybe a)
92getMaybe f (Just c)  = return . Just =<< f c
93getMaybe _ _         = return Nothing
94
95getInt :: (D.CContent c) => B.Ab c -> B.Ab Int
96getInt c = do d <- D.getDec c
97              return $ fromInteger $ D.decimalNum d
98
99getInteger :: (D.CContent c) => B.Ab c -> B.Ab Integer
100getInteger c = do i <- getInt c
101                  return $ toInteger i
102
103
104-- ----------------------  of-clock
105
106-- | [of-clock /E/ -day \/N]    Add term \/N as decimal days of clock.
107--   [of-clock /E/ -hour \/N]   Add term \/N as decimal hours of clock.
108--   [of-clock /E/ -min \/N]    Add term \/N as decimal minutes of clock.
109--   [of-clock /E/ -sec \/N]    Add term \/N as decimal seconds of clock.
110--   [of-clock /E/ -sign \/N]   Add term \/N as decimal sign of clock, i.e., -1, 0, or 1.
111--
112consOfClock :: (D.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
113consOfClock med =
114  do cops     <- Rop.getWhere   med "-where"
115     content  <- Rop.getCox     med "-content"
116     sign     <- Rop.getTermOpt med "-sign"
117     day      <- Rop.getTermOpt med "-day"
118     hour     <- Rop.getTermOpt med "-hour"
119     minute   <- Rop.getTermOpt med "-min"
120     sec      <- Rop.getTermOpt med "-sec"
121     Right $ relmapOfClock med (cops, content, [sign, day, hour, minute, sec])
122
123-- | Create @of-clockt@ relmap.
124relmapOfClock :: (D.CContent c) =>
125  C.Intmed c -> (D.CopSet c, D.Cox c, [Maybe S.TermName]) -> C.Relmap c
126relmapOfClock med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitOfClock
127
128-- | Create @of-clock@ relkit.
129relkitOfClock :: (D.CContent c) =>
130  (D.CopSet c, D.Cox c, [Maybe S.TermName]) -> C.RelkitFlow c
131relkitOfClock _ Nothing = Right C.relkitNothing
132relkitOfClock (cops, cox, ns) (Just he1) = Right kit2 where
133      he2       = B.catMaybes ns `D.headAppend` he1
134      kit2      = C.relkitJust he2 $ C.RelkitAbLinear False f2 []
135      f2 _ cs1  = do clock <- D.getClock $ D.coxRunCox cops he1 cs1 cox
136                     let cs2 = B.zipMaybe2 ns $ clockContents clock
137                     Right $ cs2 ++ cs1
138
139clockContents :: (D.CContent c) => D.Clock -> [c]
140clockContents clock = [sign, day, hour, minute, sec] where
141    sign          = D.pInt $ D.clockSign clock
142    day           = D.pInteger d
143    hour          = D.maybeEmpty D.pInt h
144    minute        = D.maybeEmpty D.pInt m
145    sec           = D.maybeEmpty D.pInt s
146    (d, h, m, s)  = D.clockAtts clock
147
148
149-- ----------------------  alt-clock
150
151-- | [alt-clock \/P -day /D/]    Alter days of clock to /D/ in term \/P.
152--   [alt-clock \/P -hour /H/]   Alter hours of clock to /H/ in term \/P.
153--   [alt-clock \/P -min /M/]    Alter minutes of clock to /M/ in term \/P.
154--   [alt-clock \/P -sec /S/]    Alter seconds of clock to /S/ in term \/P.
155--
156consAltClock :: (D.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
157consAltClock med =
158    do cops     <- Rop.getWhere    med "-where"
159       clock    <- Rop.getTerm     med "-clock"
160       day      <- Rop.getMaybeCox med "-day"
161       hour     <- Rop.getMaybeCox med "-hour"
162       minute   <- Rop.getMaybeCox med "-min"
163       sec      <- Rop.getMaybeCox med "-sec"
164       Right $ relmapAltClock med (cops, clock, (day, hour, minute, sec))
165
166-- | Create @alt-clock@ relmap.
167relmapAltClock :: (D.CContent c) =>
168  C.Intmed c -> (D.CopSet c, S.TermName, (D.MaybeCox c, D.MaybeCox c, D.MaybeCox c, D.MaybeCox c)) -> C.Relmap c
169relmapAltClock med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitAltClock
170
171-- | Create @alt-clock@ relkit.
172relkitAltClock :: (D.CContent c)
173  => (D.CopSet c, S.TermName, (D.MaybeCox c, D.MaybeCox c, D.MaybeCox c, D.MaybeCox c))
174  -> C.RelkitFlow c
175relkitAltClock _ Nothing = Right C.relkitNothing
176relkitAltClock (cops, n, (day, hour, minute, sec)) (Just he1) = Right kit2 where
177      ns1       = D.getTermNames he1
178      ind       = [n] `B.selectIndex` ns1
179      pick      = B.selectElems    ind
180      cut       = B.selectOthers   ind
181      fore      = B.permuteForward ind
182      he2       = D.headMap fore he1
183      kit2      = C.relkitJust he2 $ C.RelkitAbLinear False f2 []
184      f2 _ cs1  = do let run    = D.coxRunCox cops he1 cs1
185                         [c]    = pick cs1
186                         clock  = D.gClock c
187                     d <- getMaybe (getInteger . run) day
188                     h <- getMaybe (getInt . run) hour
189                     m <- getMaybe (getInt . run) minute
190                     s <- getMaybe (getInt . run) sec
191                     let clock' = D.clockAlter d h m s clock
192                     Right $ D.pClock clock' : cut cs1
